amendatorysection.para: Members of the council shall serve without compensation but shall be entitled to receive reimbursement for their reasonable expenses incurred in connection with their duties as members of such council from the Nebraska Health Care Association or the Nebraska Association of Homes for the Aging or such other association or group of nursing home licensees as voluntarily agrees to provide reimbursement for such expenses. No funds or state money shall be drawn upon to pay the expenses of administering sections 71-6043 to 71-6052.
